document_data.name: Ju Huo Wang
document_data.mainbody: '''Ju Huo Wang''' was a [[kensai]] master in [[Cham Fau]] in [[Shou Lung]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ju Huo worked at the [[Wang Ho School]] of martial arts in Cham Fau. He was set to inherit after his father, [[Wang Ho]], stepped down.
document_data.Personality: Ju Huo was a strong individual with a formidable temper that, despite the advice of his father, he was unable to control.
document_data.Relationship:
Ju Huo's sister [[An Ching Wang]] loved [[Chien Jang Liang]] and followed him into self-exile after he almost killed their father, Wang Ho. This act greatly enraged Ju Huo Wang.

It was rumored that Ju Huo loved fellow student [[Chen Ching Ch'ien]], but she was turned off by his temper.
